timeline.message:
Implement Bag.anySatisfyWithOccurrences(), Bag.allSatisfyWithOccurrences(), Bag.noneSatisfyWithOccurrences(), Bag.detectWithOccurrences(). Closes #406.

Signed-off-by: Alxander Goldberg <alexander.goldberg@bnymellon.com>
